name: Hades Raceway
description:
Find your way through the underworld and avoid hitting stuff in this adrenaline-driven high-speed 3d racing game. This is just a prototype, but I hope you still have fun with it.

Controls:

W: Accelerate
A/D: Steer Left/Right
J/L: Shift Left/Right
I: Drop Down when in the air
R: Restart Game

Hint 1: Dropping down/Shifting might come in more handy than you think.
Hint 2: There is a chicken hidden in this game.
